attributes.action: do something about the racism on TV highlighted by the Big Brother show on channel 4....it's shamful for that to be an impression of the British people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: do something about the racism on TV highlighted by the Big Brother show on channel 4....it's shamful for that to be an impression of the British people. I was born here and have grown up i consider myself a British citizen and i am proud of it and the country's heritage. to let someone like J.Goody and her two cronies make a mockery and embarrass the UK like they are doing is deeply shameful. They are portraying an awful image of the UK and it must be stopped!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
